name: Bodyweight Squats
description: Feet shoulder-width apart, sit back and keep the chest tall.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward, lower the back knee towards the floor, drive up through the front heel.

name: Glute Bridges
description: Heels close to glutes, squeeze at the top, lower under control.

name: Press-ups
description: Hands under shoulders, body in one line, lower chest then press back.

name: Incline Press-ups
description: Hands on a bench or table to reduce load while keeping a straight body line.

name: Tricep Dips (Chair)
description: Hands behind on a chair, elbows back, lower under control then drive up.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: High plank position, drive knees to chest alternately while keeping hips steady.

name: Burpees
description: Squat, kick back to plank, return to squat, then jump explosively.

name: Plank Shoulder Taps
description: High plank, tap opposite shoulder while minimising hip sway.
